MESSAGE: Can I blow up the door?
Go to the tree.  Press SPACEBAR or click ACTION to chop 4 logs.
Press SPACEBAR or click ACTION to make planks.
Climb the hill.  Press SPACEBAR or click ACTION to make a ladder.
Climb the ladder... collect the potions...
Press SPACEBAR or click ACTION for a permanent JUMP BOOST!
